title: $1900/2 br/2 bath/1200 ft: Cherry Creek school; no sec. 8
posting_body: ['LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION UNIT D Minutes from DTC and Park Meadows, walking distance to light rail On South Xenia Circle in Centennial South Xenia Circle is 1 block North of Dry Creek on Yosemite Directions: Take I-25 to Dry Creek, go West on Dry Creek to Yosemite.', 'Go', 'North (right) to the 1st light and turn West (left) onto Xanthia Street; complex is on the right -- turn right onto Xenia Circle -- it circles around the complex.', 'AVAILABLE August 1st', '*', 'Remodeled upscale two-bedroom two full bath condo on a 2nd floor of 3-story building *', 'Hard floors throughout the condo.', '*Community Amenities: pool, clubhouse, tennis court, play area $1,900 month + $1,900 deposit.', 'Spacious 1,120 sq.', 'ft. Water, Sewer & Trash included in rent.', 'HOA maintenance included in rent FEATURES/AMENITIES:', 'Balcony Large walk-in closet in master bedroom Wood burning fireplace Central Heating and Air Covered Parking -- 1 carport space; plenty of extra parking spots Storage closet in carport Full size washer & Dryer Hunters Hill has a pool, clubhouse, and tennis courts 12 month lease Schools: Cherry Creek School District Elementary: Walnut Hills Elementary School', 'Middle: Campus Middle School High School: Cherry Creek High School']
